title: Upgrade to have SCIM
body: SCIM group to role mapping is a premium feature of our Enterprise plan. Upgrade to have SCIM setup available.

title: License limit reached
body: You already have the maximum number (249) of standard licenses. To activate 'user email' upgrade your plan, deactivate an inactive user, or add them under a restricted license.

title: Downgrade to Essentials?
body: Choosing Essentials will result in losing features you've been using like Insightboards, Custom fields, KPIs, Badges, and Reports.

title: You're on the Essentials Plan
body: Welcome to Essentials. This free plan gives you the basics needed to be successful with OKRs.

title: You're on the new Scale plan
body: We've simplified our plans. Don't worry: all the features you know and love are here to stay. We've put you on Scale for the next 90 days with your current price.If you haven't upgraded by [date], you'll be switched to our free Essentials plan.
